function_call.name: eval_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":["Potential spread of contagious diseases due to population density and compact design in built environments.","Rapid spread of contagious diseases due to sudden policy changes impacting built environment development.","Propagation of contagious diseases due to increased interconnectedness and decentralization of society.","Spread of COVID-19 due to lack of containment measures.","Propagation of misinformation and disinformation about COVID-19.","Transmission of contagious diseases through medical data exchange.","Lack of compliance with quarantine and surveillance measures.","Inadequate sanitization procedures.","Conflicting priorities between science-based strategies and economic or political demands.","Disproportionate impact of climate crisis and COVID-19 on vulnerable populations.","Inadequate ventilation and air circulation leading to the spread of contagious diseases within buildings.","Inadequate sanitation and hygiene leading to the spread of contagious diseases within buildings.","Overcrowding and insufficient space leading to the potential for rapid disease transmission within buildings."]}
